text: 14:3 Mak 16:20; Aposel 19:11; Hibru 2:4Ezɨ Pol ko Barnabas dughiar ruarimɨn Aikoniamɨn ikiava, Ekiamɨn apangkuvimɨn akam mɨkɨmasava atiatir puvatɨ. Ezɨ Ekiam gavgavim aning ganɨngizɨ, aning mirakelba ko dɨgavir kuram gamir bizibagh ami, da otifi. Ezɨ kamaghɨn Ekiam gumazamizibar akakagha ghaze, akar aning me mɨgeir kaba, da guizɨn akaba.
